longBusinessSummary: ATIF Holdings Limited operates as a consulting company in Asia and North America. It offers financial consulting services to small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs). The company primarily helps clients going public on the OTC markets and exchanges in the United States. It also operates IPOEX.com, an internet-based financial consulting service platform which provides comprehensive consulting services in equity financing and pre-IPO education for corporate clients in equity financing, IPO, and media relations development; and chinacnnm.com, a news and financial information platform. In addition, the company offers going public consulting, M&A consulting, and international financial consulting services, as well as investment and financing due diligence services. The company was incorporated in 2015 and is based in Lake Forest, California.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Ian  Zhou
companyOfficers.title: Chief Exec. Officer of Asset Investment Division
